title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Add Allow/Off mode for each Action type overall enforcement
description: With Off, Endpoint DLP will not fire any event/Alert and will not trigger any toast. The customer can use this enforcement mode to have restriction for a specific group. With Allow, Endpoint DLP will not fire any Alert and will not trigger any toast but will fire an event on Activity Explorer. Currently, Endpoint DLP only supports Audit only, Block, and Block With override.
